dao.name: QRY_CUST_COD_SELECT
dao.statement: Select cust_cod, show_cod , cust_nam From psi_cust_mn Where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) and cust_cod in (Select key_cod2 from sec_typ_ctrl Where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) And sys_cod='PSI_WEB' And remark_cod='usr_cust' And trim(key_cod1) = trim(:key_cod1)) Order by show_cod

dao.name: QRY_SEARCH_CUST_COD_SELECT
dao.statement: Select cust_cod, show_cod, cust_nam From psi_cust_mn Where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) and cust_cod in (Select key_cod2 from sec_typ_ctrl Where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) And sys_cod='PSI_WEB' And remark_cod='usr_cust' And trim(key_cod1) = trim(:key_cod1)) Order by show_cod

dao.name: QRY_CUST_INFO
dao.statement: Select show_cod, cust_nam, accunt_sta, accunt_nos, ship_typ, sales_cod From psi_cust_mn Where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) and trim(cust_cod) = trim(:cust_cod)
